result.title: Need help to reduce Time Complexity of LightOJ 1292
result.content:
I've solved LightOJ 1292 (Alternative link in case you've no account on LightOJ) with complexity n^2(log(n)). You can view my solution here.

n for each point taking as fixed point, a multiplicative n factor for finding polar angle with others, & multiplicative log(n) factor for counting using map.

My solution took around 3.332s. As of my calculation, it should take about 1s. I think it's for mapping pair. However, ignore it. [UPDATE] Time reduced to 1.92s using map with double. In previous submission, I used pair(nominator and denominator) to represent a fractional number as there might be some precision error.

I've seen some submission which takes about .025s. Now, I want to learn their process. Help me please. :)
